response.original_title: A Última Tentativa de Um Cineasta Antes de se Tornar um Batedor de Carteiras
response.overview: Broke and without support, a filmmaker starts questioning why she still insists on making movies. With festival rejections piling up and doors that never open, everything seems to point to failure. In a conversation with a friend, a dilemma arises: keep filming or find something more profitable - maybe even pickpocketing? But the biggest question of all still haunts her: when, if ever, will someone finally watch her film?
response.title: A Última Tentativa de Um Cineasta Antes de se Tornar um Batedor de Carteiras
